title: Gautam Gambhir made unsavoury remarks about Sourav Ganguly: Manoj Tiwary
text: Gambhir-Tiwary spat: It's for BCCI to take a call, says Tiwary 02:12 New Delhi, Oct 25 (ANI): After a detailed report and related videos to corroborate facts was submitted to the BCCI, Bengal skipper Manoj Tiwary on Sunday said it was for the BCCI to take a call. Earlier, on Sunday, the BCCI said it would take "appropriate action" in Gambhir- Tiwary spat. Delhi... Recent related news He made racist remarks made about Sourav Ganguly and Bengalis. I spoke to Sourav Ganguly and he is very upset that his name has been dragged in the matter. We...
